name: Trolley Boy (UbisoftGameJam 3.0)
description:
You were asked to buy some bananas in the store but you don't want to stay in line.
What are you going to do?

The small  game which was made by me with Taras Kovtun, Olga Vozniuk , Vitalii Kashuba and Maksym Suvorov during the UbisoftGameJam which took place on April  Fri13 in Kyiv
